review: i love overwatch. despite all that's happened, i've been very positive about the game. however, sending $40 on something and then not receiving it is a HUGE roblem and based on that alone, i cannot recommend other people get this game right now.
The good news? Everything wrong with this game can be fixed.

I write this review mainly for my friend who probably will spending hours into this game
I've been into Overwatch since 2016 as well from beta. Truth is Overwatch is a really polished game with tons of unique of characters and animation, each were foundation of their personality. in short the game is excellent of raw materials.
Too bad it was controlled by Activision Blizzard, these are the greediest video game company that ever existed aside from EA. 
The original developer are quit from Blizzard due to its controversial which is stupid considering this game is based on diversity.

Overall we as a original player, are totally disappointed more than word could describe. its just not worth it to put hours into the game that basically just aiming for your wallet. There were bunch a lot of things of what makes this game not enjoyable as it did in 2016. But the current situation are just ugly.
